name: Cyprus Shooting Clays Academy
description: Professional clay shooting training academy in Limassol, Cyprus, offering specialized programs for all skill levels. Led by Renos Charalampous, an ISSF Level A Coach and European Champion, we provide expert instruction in Olympic Trap, Skeet, and Clay Target shooting. With over 15 years of experience, multiple international certifications, and a proven track record of training over 600 students, we offer personalized instruction in a safe, controlled environment. Our comprehensive programs range from beginner courses to advanced competition preparation.
